message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you at a special price of $20,000. I know you'll find great value in it.
I'm interested in the product, but $20,000 is a bit steep for me. I'm willing to pay $12,000 for it.
Bob, I appreciate your interest.  While $20,000 represents the value of this product, I'm willing to come down to $17,000. I believe that's a fair compromise.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but $17,000 is still a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to pay $14,000 for the product.
